product_name: REI Timber Mountain Snowsuit - Infant/Toddler Girls'
long_description: The REI Timber Mountain snowsuit helps keep infants and toddlers warm and protected from the weather. Coated nylon shell is windproof and water-resistant; hood and body feature soft and cozy polyester fleece lining for added warmth. Hood has side elastic and rip-and-stick tab to adjust volume. Features full front zipper, elastic waist, elastic wrist cuffs with rip-and-stick closures, and snow cuffs with elastic grippers at ankles. REI Timber Mountain snowsuit has two zippered pant pockets.
short_description: The REI Timber Mountain snowsuit helps keep infants and toddlers warm and protected from the weather.
